trans-unit.source: Represents a token resolver that can resolve tokens of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> against a specified X.509 certificate store.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509CertificateStoreTokenResolver"></xref> class with a default X.509 certificate store.
The default store location is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation.LocalMachine>.
The default store name is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName.My>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509CertificateStoreTokenResolver"></xref> class that uses the X.509 certificate store with the specified location and name to resolve tokens.
One of the enumeration values that specify the name of the X.509 certificate store.
One of the enumeration values that specify the location of the X.509 certificate store.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509CertificateStoreTokenResolver"></xref> class that uses the X.509 certificate store with the specified location and name to resolve tokens.
The name of the X.509 certificate store.
One of the enumeration values that specify the location of an X.509 certificate store.
storeLocation is `null` or an empty string.
Gets the location of the X.509 certificate store that is used by this token resolver.
One of the enumeration values that specify the location of an X.509 certificate store.
Gets the name of the X.509 certificate store that is used by this token resolver.
The name of the X.509 certificate store that is used by this token resolver.
Attempts to resolve the specified key identifier clause to a security key.
The key identifier clause from which to resolve the security key.
When this method returns, contains the security key that was resolved from the key identifier clause.
This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
`true` if the key identifier clause is successfully resolved; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifierClause is `null`.
Resolves the specified key identifier to a security token.
The key identifier to resolve.
When this method returns, contains the security token that was resolved from the key identifier.
This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
`true` if the key identifier is successfully resolved; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifier is `null`.
Resolves the specified key identifier clause to a security token.
The key identifier clause to resolve.
When this method returns, contains the security token that was resolved from the key identifier clause.
This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
`true` if the key identifier clause is successfully resolved; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifierClause is `null`.
